overview:
Get tips on safety measures by Chris Loomis only at Safetyattitude.com. Chris has four fantastic presentations for you to choose from.

Company Overview:

With over 20 years of plant safety experience, Chris Loomis is a true safety consultant and professional. He has seen and experienced the challenges faced by plant safety personnel while working with over 600 chemical, petrochemical, and manufacturing facilities as the Marketing Manager for DuPont’s environmental and safety services division.

Chris was then recruited by DuPont Chemicals to be the Marketing Manager for their environmental and safety services division. Chris is an International Safety Speaker, Author and National Safety Writer. Chris is a motivational safety speaker and believes that accidents and near misses can be avoided by developing a Safety Attitude and always being aware of YOUR surroundings. His message has resonated with plant personnel everywhere he has spoken. Chris’s safety consulting has helped his clients achieve significant savings.
